page.title: 16SHOPS AND TRADESMEN,HIGH HAM
page.content: High Ham is the only village in the area to have a shop or a Post Office. The shop sells a variety of goods including sweets,groceries & hardware. The small Sub-Post Office also sells cards and stationery. 9 mobile shops visit the area: a grocer comes on Mondays; a milkman delivers fresh milk on Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays; newspapers are delivered daily by van; a baker comes on Tuesdays, Thursdays and Saturdays; a butcher delivers on Wednesdays and Saturdays; eggs are delivered on Wednesdays, fish on Fridays & greengroceries on Saturdays. The library van comes on Wednesdays and signals by tooting his horn. Of the 100 households surveyed 50-60% use the milkman, newsagent and baker, 25% use the grocer and less than 10% use the greengrocer, butcher, fishmonger and the library.
